solution_line_template: Curtis had the Salisbury steak for ${curtis_steak_cost} and Rob had the Chicken Fried Steak at ${rob_steak_cost} so their meal cost {curtis_steak_cost}+{rob_steak_cost} = $<<{curtis_steak_cost}+{rob_steak_cost}={initial_total_cost}>>{initial_total_cost}
They ate 3 pm so their meal is half off so their meal cost {initial_total_cost}/{discount_divisor} = ${final_bill_cost}
